oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mitchell's Map of Tennessee 1839
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: J.H. Young
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Tourist's Pocket Map of the State of Tennessee Exhibiting Its Internal Improvements, Road Distances, &c. by J.H. Young (James Hamilton Young), Philadelphia: Published by S. Augustus Mitchell. 1839. Sold by Thomas, Cowperthwait & Co., No. 253 Market Street. Folding map with hard cover. 31 x 38 cm. Color. Includes insets on Vicinity of Nashville and Vicinity of Knoxville. Also includes three distance charts, Principal Stage Routes Through Tennessee, and Steam Boat Routes. Tennessee Census numbers by county for 1830 on inside cover.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Maps;
